oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pilot Randomized Trial of Vaginal Progesterone to Prevent Preterm Birth in Multiple Pregnancy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wood, Stephen
Ross, Sue
Tang, Selphee
Miller, Leslie
Sauve, Reg
Brant, Rollin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of this study was to see if daily use of vaginal progesterone will prevent preterm birth in women carrying 2 or more babies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
